lead_paragraph: Hertha Berlin striker Salomon Kalou scored a second-half equaliser as they stumbled to a 2-2 draw against bottom side Hanover 96 on Friday, opening the door to their rivals in the battle for Germany's third Champions League spot.

headline.print_headline: Kalou Rescues Point as Hertha Draw With Hanover
headline.main: Kalou Rescues Point as Hertha Draw With Hanover

snippet: Hertha Berlin striker Salomon Kalou scored a second-half equaliser as they stumbled to a 2-2 draw against bottom side Hanover 96 on Friday, opening the door to their rivals in the battle for Germany's third Champions League spot....
